amendment.description: Amendment redirects $20 million in funding within the Public Housing Operating Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 26 printed in the Congressional Record to redirect appropriations for the Public Housing Operating Fund by $20 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Hastings (FL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
